org.tal.redstonechips
Class CircuitPersistence

java.lang.Object
  org.tal.redstonechips.CircuitPersistence

public class CircuitPersistence
extends Object

A bunch of static methods for saving and loading circuit states.

Author:
Tal Eisenberg

Method Detail

loadOldFile

public boolean loadOldFile()
Attempts to load the old circuits file (redstonechips.circuits). This is only used in case the old file name is found in the plugin folder. File is renamed to redstonechips.circuits.old.

Returns:
true if the old file exists. false otherwise.
